sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the thorough cleaning of laboratory components using high-frequency sound waves.
sections.scope: Applicable to cleaning activities in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry Laboratory.
procedure: Fill the tank with an appropriate cleaning solution up to the operating level.
Ensure the solution is degassed by running the unit for 5-10 minutes before use.
Place the items to be cleaned in the stainless steel basket.
Lower the basket into the tank so that the items are completely submerged.
Set the desired temperature and cleaning time on the control panel.
Press 'START' to begin the ultrasonic cycle.
After the cycle is complete, remove the basket and rinse items with distilled water.
Turn OFF the power and drain the tank periodically as per usage.
Wipe the interior of the tank with a soft, dry cloth.
precautions: Never operate the unit without sufficient liquid in the tank.
Do not place items directly on the bottom of the tank; always use the basket.
Avoid placing hands in the tank during operation.
Use only water-based cleaning agents or those specified by the manufacturer.
Disconnect the power supply before draining or cleaning the tank.
